Service Details: - Offers a program that includes three components, working to provide support, mentorship, and positive direction to youth who are in conflict with the law - Choices, Intensive Support and PeNRAP Programs are alternative-to-custody sentencing options for young offenders, day programs, and/or re-integration support following a youth's return from custody to the community - Works in partnership with Youth Forensic Psychiatric Services (MCFD) to provide The Boundaries Program, an Intensive Residential Attendance Program for youth 12-19 years old, convicted of an offense, and their families
How to Apply: Referrals to the programs are through the MCFD Kelowna Youth Probation team
